registration.title: Kwiyandikisha
registration.step_health_center: Injiza izina ry’ivuriro ujya kwivurizaho cyangwa 1 kugirango duhuze n'ivuriro hafi
registration.confirm_consent: Wemeye ko amakuru yawe akoreshwa mu buvuzi? 1.Yego 2.Oya
registration.registration_complete: Murakoze! Wiyandikishije. MotherLink ID yawe ni: {{id}}

update_info.title: Kuvugurura Amakuru
update_info.menu:
Hitamo icyo ushaka kuvugurura:
1. Aho utuye
2. Ubwishingizi
3. Nimero y’indangamuntu
4. Ivuriro ujya kwivurizaho
5. Amezi utwite (Abagore batwite gusa)
6. Gusohoka
update_info.update_health_center: Andika izina ry’ivuriro cyangwa 1 kugirango duhuze n'ivuriro hafi

report_emergency.title: Tanga Ikibabaje/Ibyihutirwa
report_emergency.additional_info_prompt:
Tubwire byinshi ku kibabaje (bitari ngombwa)

Andika ubutumwa bwawe cyangwa ukande 1 kugirango urenze

ai_assistance.title: Inama z'Ubuzima
ai_assistance.select_category: Hitamo icyiciro cy'inama kugira ngo ubone ubufasha bwa AI
ai_assistance.custom_prompt: Andika ikibazo cyawe cy'ikibabaje cyangwa ukande 1 kugira ngo usubire inyuma

distress.title: Akaga Gakomeye
distress.message: Uri mu kaga gakomeye? Niba ari byo, emeza kandi ubufasha buzaza ako kanya.
